definition: The duration of a specific process or course of action, typically referring to the time period required for a particular treatment, therapy, or medical procedure.

examples.english: The treatment duration is six weeks.

examples.german: Die Behandlungsdauer kann je nach Krankheitsverlauf variieren.
examples.english: The treatment duration can vary depending on the course of the disease.

examples.german: Die Behandlungsdauer hängt von der Schwere der Erkrankung ab.
examples.english: The treatment duration depends on the severity of the illness.
The treatment duration is determined individually.

examples.german: Die Behandlungsdauer kann verlängert werden, wenn nötig.
examples.english: The treatment duration can be extended if necessary.
